attributes.action: Allow the people of Britain to vote in a referrendum on the Lisbon treaty(eu constitution), as pomised in the Labour party manifesto, and to admit that he lied that the two are completely different.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The eu constitution which was democratically rejected was renamed the lisbon treaty, it has also been democratically rejected, despite this the prime minister has signed the UK up to be governed by the unelected commission of the corrupt democratically deficient federal states of europe, without asking the people for a mandate, as promised in the Labour party manifesto on which he was elected.

He has lied to the public that the Lisbon treaty is not the constitution, although they are identical in outcome.
